author: jpata
body:
- Only changes the [reco release profiling](https://cmssdt.cern.ch/jenkins/job/release-run-reco-profiling/) functionality in the bot.
- For release-run-reco-profiling, now runs igprof after everything else (step3 and step4 circles, TimeMemory etc).
- Do not abort the jenkins job in case of missing outputs.
- Motivated by the issues with igprof in 12_0_0_pre4: https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/34517
- Tested successfully in https://cmssdt.cern.ch/jenkins/job/release-run-reco-profiling/119

cc @cms-sw/reconstruction-l2
title: reco release profiling: run igprof after everything else
